club.name: London, Central

meeting.venue: Nippon Club Salon, 2nd floor, Samuel House
meeting.location: 6 St Albans Street, (off Jermyn Street) London, SW1Y 4SQ
meeting.directions: Behind Mitsukoshi Department Store on Lower Regent Street. (Parallel and between it and Haymarket.) Three minutes from Piccadilly Circus Underground
meeting.comment: At the entrance, ring the bell for Nippon Club to get in. Board fee still GBP3.00 per player

club.comment: Since 5th January 2008, CLGC and Nippon Club Igo Kai have held joint meeting on Saturdays. It is an ideal club for those players who wish to drop in after shopping in Central London. It is open to Go players of all strengths including complete beginners. Now meeting from 2-9pm, possibly later. You can have a nice diner afterwards in one of the hundreds of restaurants in SOHO if you wish.

club.name: London, Nippon Club Igo Kai
club.comment: Currently CLGC is holding a joint meeting in the Nippon club with NCIK on Saturdays, and the Friday meetings are on hold. However it is hoped that Friday meetings will resume again in the near future.
